body:
### Steps to reproduce

I am trying to install q-e-sirius with rocm 

and there seems to be some problem on hip

I'm doing something like

```
spack install gcc
spack install sirius +rocm amdgpu_target=gfx803
spack install q-e-sirius ^sirius +rocm amdgpu_target=gfx803
```

The sirius with rocm can be successfully installed but the q-e-sirius failed.

Did I miss anything?

### Error message
